name: GKAgent
desc: A component that moves a game entity according to a set of goals and realistic constraints.

items.name: var behavior: GKBehavior?
items.desc: A weighted collection of goals that influence the agent’s movement.

items.name: var mass: Float
items.desc: The resistance of the agent to changes in speed or direction.

items.name: var maxAcceleration: Float
items.desc: The upper limit to changes in the agent’s speed or direction.

items.name: var maxSpeed: Float
items.desc: The agent’s maximum forward speed, in units per second.

items.name: var delegate: GKAgentDelegate?
items.desc: An object that prepares for or responds to updates in the agent simulation.

items.name: var speed: Float
items.desc: The agent’s current forward speed, in units per second.
